ygData.subject: Re: Amazon (Amazon Warrior)
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, it was my main character concept. Ephany, Amazon Warrior, Fennin Ro ... _______________________________________________________________ Get Free Email
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, it was my main character concept.

Ephany, Amazon Warrior, Fennin Ro

>
>From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
>Although warrior is gender neutral, I kind of like Amazon or Amazon Warrior
>myself. Sends a good message to the men that spend their time trying to
>flirt with me instead of fighting. Anyone that knows anything about
>Amazons
>knows what they do to male children!
>
>For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;
>
>Patty of Halas
>username: Patricia
>server: Bristlebane
